item.title: Open Letter to U.S. Ambassador to China Nicholas Burns Regarding Human Rights and Peaceful Protest
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-11-open-letter-to-ambassador-nicholas-burns.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: Open Letter to Ambassador Nicholas Burns Regarding Human Rights and Peaceful Protest Date sent: December 11, 2023, 21:38 (China Standard Time) To: Nicholas Burns (U.S. Ambassador) Cc: Catherine Colonna (French Minister for Europe and Foreign Affairs), Bertrand Lortholary (Ambassador of France to China), Roy Guillaume (France Consul General - China), Edward Lehman, Adam Rogalski (Legal Attach√©/State Department) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-11-open-letter-to-ambassador-nicholas-burns.

item.title: Email sent on 2022-12-31 to the U.S. Ambassador to China, Nicholas Burns
item.description:
From: Vincent B. Le Corre
Subject: Open letter to Mr. Nicholas Burns and to the U.S. Ambassador to China
Date sent: December 31, 2022 at 01:36 +0800 (China Standard Time)
To: Nicholas Burns (U.S. Ambassador)
